entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

More info: Writing

Run server

More info: Server

Generate static files

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

More info: Deployment

entry.title: 充电说明
entry.content:
关于哔哩哔哩充电说明

从本blog发布开始，凡是在哔哩哔哩给White_mu充电的观众
可以在本blog看到该观众的名字
具体格式如下：

？？/？？/？？充电感谢

？？？

例如

2021/01/24充电感谢

White_mu

entry.title: 文章模板
entry.content:
$ --- # 基本格式
$ title: My awesome title # 标题
$ date: 2016-10-12 18:38:45 # 日期
$ categories: # 分类
       - 分类1
       - 分类2
$ tags:  # 标签
       - 标签1
       - 标签2
$ mp3: http://domain.com/awesome.mp3 # 背景音乐（已禁用）
$ cover: http://domain.com/awesome.jpg # 配图
$ --- # 基本格式
